alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; La Porte; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 1:15AM EDT until July 29 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern White County in northwestern Indiana... Western Fulton County in north central Indiana... Pulaski County in northwestern Indiana... Northwestern Cass County in north central Indiana... Starke County in northwestern Indiana... Western Marshall County in north central Indiana... Southern La Porte County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 215 AM EDT/115 AM CDT/. * At 115 AM EDT/1215 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wanatah to near Rensselaer, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Knox, Winamac, Walkerton, Monon, North Judson, Culver, Francesville, Royal Center, Hamlet, Medaryville, La Crosse, Koontz Lake, Pulaski, Oak Grove, Ripley, Kewanna, La Paz, Monterey, and Lomax. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; La Porte; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke; White
